welcome.the: The one-stop shop for businesses and individuals for effective climate action!
welcome.weConnect: We connect you to the world's most impactful climate positive solutions through 1 click. Navigate your dashboard to track, trace, and visualize the impact of your climate investments in real-time!
welcome.are: Are you a business or an individual?

aboutPublic.changingDescription: The landscape of tomorrow is built by our actions today. GFP aims to accelerate the pace of change, by being the conduit between businesses, individuals and climate solutions. Our goal is to harness the power of collective action, connecting brands, organisations and consumers intent on contributing to a greener future.
aboutPublic.goalDescription: is to reverse the effects of climate change, preserving the planet for both current and future generations
aboutPublic.makingDescription: We want to prove that sustainability can be profitable. GFP supports businesses to partner with the world’s best climate projects, building a greater impact as you inspire your customers, and other industry players to follow.
aboutPublic.missionDescription: is to simplify access to effective climate solutions and empower you to have an active role in reversing climate change
aboutPublic.offsetDescription: The carbon offset generated by the climate solutions you support is certified by the highest verification standards, such as Gold Standard and Carbon Verra, or backed by extensive scientific research.
aboutPublic.protect: Why is it important to protect this {{value}}?
aboutPublic.responsibilityDescription: We are all on this planet together – in order to preserve it for future generations, we must make sustainability the focus of our decisions and our actions. We all have a responsibility, and everyone deserves the chance to pitch in.
aboutPublic.restoreDescription: Our restoration and preservation projects find their home in some of the richest areas of biodiversity on the planet. By supporting these projects, you are protecting endangered species and ensuring the longevity of crucial ecosystems.
aboutPublic.simplifyDescription: Complex problems can seem impossible to solve – we aim to simplify. Our goal is to provide clarity and transparency, highlighting the partners and processes involved in all GFP’s climate solutions. Our subscriptions make it easy for you to track and understand your impact.
aboutPublic.solutionDescription:
We developed an innovative platform for you to track, trace, and visualize your impact in real-time.

Our interactive dashboard bridges you to the world’s best climate solutions through a gamified experience where you can learn, and engage with the projects you support.
aboutPublic.supportDescription: All the NGOs that we collaborate with work in close contact with local communities. By supporting these projects you are increasing fair employment rates and improving living conditions for local communities.
aboutPublic.title:
We bridge you to the best 
climate solutions
aboutPublic.visionDescription: is the continued acceleration of change, by harnessing the power of collective action

landingPublic.hitYourESG:
The 360° ESG Solution
for your Net Zero Journey
landingPublic.simplifyAction: We simplify climate action on your behalf  🌱
landingPublic.trackVisualize:
Measure & Reduce your CO2 emissions.
Monitor & Share your positive impact in real-time.
Our turn-key platform simplifies the development,
implementation and visualization of your ESG strategy.
landingPublic.reduceLifestyle: Finally, reducing your lifestyle carbon footprint is only 1 click away! Using our tools, you can access and support climate projects that have a tangible and proven positive impact.
landingPublic.simple: Effective solutions to plug into your business
landingPublic.hand: Our climate positive solutions at your hand
landingPublic.experience: Experience a selection of our projects
landingPublic.follow: Follow us on instagram and don’t miss out on anything!
landingPublic.cookies: Please accept cookies to enjoy the full GFP experience!

businessSolutions.ourComprehensive: Our comprehensive and easy-to-integrate solutions can meet your sustainability business needs and support your ESG targets at every step of your net zero journey.

measure.measureYourScope: Measure your Scope 1, 2 and 3 CO2 emissions and initiate targeted actions to save energy, reduce costs and environmental impact across your company’s building portfolio and in line with the GHG Protocol.

clickedMeasure.theStarting: The starting point of your journey: a complimentary assessment that provides recommendations on key focus areas.
clickedMeasure.monitorAndManage: Monitor and manage your energy consumption to save money, reduce your environmental impact, and report achievements.
clickedMeasure.calculateFootprint: Calculate your company's carbon footprint and demonstrate accountability by setting targets and working towards your net zero goals.

offset.topInClass: Top-in-class Solutions to Compensate your Emissions
offset.fromCertified: From certified carbon credits and biodiversity tokens to subscriptions that decarbonise employees’ professional and personal footprint, our verified solutions empower businesses to have an active role in mitigating climate change.

clickedOffset.ourTool: Our tool allows you to purchase verified, high quality CO2 credits, giving you the option to choose among certified and science-backed, as well as biodiversity tokens. Simply insert the emissions you’d like to compensate for and select the solution that suits best to your needs.
clickedOffset.goBeyond: Go beyond selling by offering your customers the opportunity to support high-impact environmental projects for every product they buy on your website or App.
clickedOffset.demonstrate: Demonstrate to your employees the commitment to the environment by offsetting their professional and personal carbon footprint.

track.climateImpact: Your Climate Impact at a Glance
track.trackReport: Track, report and visualize the impact of your company's climate investments in real-time through our personalised dashboard. We leverage on an innovative satellite technology to guarantee transparency on projects’ progress.

clickedTrack.scientific: Scientific data and projects progress in real-time
clickedTrack.platform: GFP’s platform simplifies the process of collecting all the information needed in one place. You can monitor your impact, immerse yourself into our projects, download reports and disclose data confidently with clients and stakeholders.
clickedTrack.ourSatellite: Our satellite imagery technology guarantees complete transparency on your climate impact.

communicate.showcaseAspects: Showcase all aspects of your climate action through shareable impact cards, impact reports as well as a personalized widget on your website, app and products. These are updated real-time and include all details of your project portfolio.

clickedCommunicate.addCustomized: Add a customized widget to any digital platform you own and show the positive impact of your climate action. Engage your community providing full visibility around your supported projects.
clickedCommunicate.treePlanting: From CO2 offset to tree planting, spark the interest of clients and stakeholders on your ESG strategy and milestones through our sharable impact cards and quarterly impact report.
clickedCommunicate.interactivePartner: Our interactive Partner Media Kit provides you with the tools to effectively communicate our partnership and engage your community. It includes communication guidelines, social media templates, project photos, and much more.

esg.tailored: Tailored Support on a Continuous Reduction Journey
esg.ourCarbon: Our Carbon Accounting & ESG Experts provide advisory services that span from corporate, product or event carbon footprint reporting, to the definition of a decarbonisation strategy, including recommended actions, science-based targets and roadmap.

clickedEsg.support: We support you in performing a full carbon audit across all areas of impact with an overall carbon footprint of products or events.
clickedEsg.calculating: Calculating the carbon footprint makes it possible to identify the areas, factors or production steps that contribute most to the greenhouse gases emissions. This allows to design a plan aimed at reducing impacts along the value chain or offsetting emissions.

carbonDioxideOffset.aSimple: A simple tool to access a wide portfolio of top in class carbon offset projects

landingPublicExplore.findTheClimate: Find the climate solution that best fits your business needs and net zero goals!
landingPublicExplore.findTheClimateB2C: Find the climate solution that best fits your lifestyle & needs!
landingPublicExplore.allOfOurSolutions: All of our solutions give you access to our dashboard where you can track your investments and impact in real-time!
landingPublicExplore.ourCarbon: Offset your company's carbon footprint! Purchase carbon credits by inserting the emissions you'd like to compensate for.
landingPublicExplore.youHave: Choose to invest in different certified projects, get a certificate for your certified carbon credits, and get access a personalised dashboard to track your carbon offset.
landingPublicExplore.whether: Whether you’re an e-commerce or an app, integrate our API into your platform and  reduce your business carbon footprint transaction
landingPublicExplore.percentage: (a) % of your monthly revenue to invest
landingPublicExplore.setAmount: (b) set amount for each item sold
landingPublicExplore.setUp: Set up a monthly carbon reduction plan for your business!
landingPublicExplore.select: Select a one-person or a family-sized monthly subscription plan that reflects your lifestyle and level of commitment. If you’re not sure about your carbon impact, you can use our CO2 footprint calculator.
landingPublicExplore.impactful: Make impactful contribution to CO2 reduction for the cost of a latte.
landingPublicExplore.lead: Lead the way by offsetting the carbon footprint of your employees’ personal and professional lifestyle based on their travel & lifestyle habits and accelerate your employees climate action!
landingPublicExplore.would: Would you like to make a world of difference with a planet-friendly gift?
landingPublicExplore.treat: Treat your employees and colleagues to one of our unique climate positive gifts to kick-start their climate journey!
landingPublicExplore.choosePortfolio: Choose from our portfolio of projects around the world!
landingPublicExplore.treatB2C: Give one of our sustainable gift to your friends or family to improve their climate consciousness
landingPublicExplore.finance: Finance and invest in projects that are closer to your home, and help us scale up its impact.
landingPublicExplore.areYou: Are you an non-fungible token (NFT) creator?
landingPublicExplore.ourPlugIn: Our plug-in allows you to invest a % of your NFT royalties to compensate for the carbon footprint of trading and minting.
landingPublicExplore.contactUs: Contact us to get more information or to activate it now!

landingPublicSupporting.bodyMarine: In Jamaica, the Alligator Head Foundation is dedicated to the regeneration of marine habitats and to the protection of fish stocks, while empowering local economies.

marineFirst.hotspot1: Stop worrying. Don't give up!🤗 You have mostly sand right now, with a few bleached coral patches and a few healthy corals rehomed on-site. Small fish🐟 and a lack of sea life.
marineFirst.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineFirst.hotspot3: Coral species: staghorn coral (Acropora cervicornis); blue coral (Heliopora coerulea) ; Acroporta austere ; Sinularia brassica.
marineFirst.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus) ; hermit crab (Dardanus)
marineFirst.hotspot5: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species

marineSecond.hotspot1: You have an appointment with your forest!🌅 The sand seafloor has evolved since the first stage, with fewer bleached coral patches and more healthy corals.
marineSecond.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineSecond.hotspot3: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species
marineSecond.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus) ; hermit crab (Dardanus)
marineSecond.hotspot5: Coral species: staghorn coral (Acropora cervicornis); blue coral (Heliopora coerulea) ; Acroporta austere ; Sinularia brassica;

marineThird.hotspot1: That is incredible!💥 The visibility of the seabed deteriorates. It's growing in size. The polyps are especially noticeable🐙.Smaller schools of fish are forming around the corals. You have turtles! 🐢
marineThird.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineThird.hotspot3: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species
marineThird.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus) ; hermit crab (Dardanus)blue chromis (Chromis cyanea); green sea turtle (Cheloniamydas); blacktip shark (Carcharhinus limbatus); black sea cucumber (Holothuria atra).

marineFourth.hotspot1: WHAT👏A👏GREAT👏GAME!. The reef has been completely rebuilt and is now rising. Increase of colourful fish swimming close to the corals🐠. Sharks have joined the mix!🦈
marineFourth.hotspot2: Coral reefs provide an important ecosystem for life underwater, protect coastal areas by buffering shorelines against 97 percent of the energy from waves, and provide a crucial source of income for millions of people.
marineFourth.hotspot3: Coral reefs support more species per unit area than any other marine environment, including about 4,000 species of fish, 800 species of hard corals and hundreds of other species
marineFourth.hotspot4: Marine fauna: lemon gamsel (Pomacentrus moluccensis); banded coral shrimp (Stenopus hispidus); hermit crab (Dardanus) blue chromis (Chromis cyanea); green sea turtle (Chelonia mydas); blacktip shark (Carcharhinus limbatus); black sea cucumber (Holothuria atra).

preservationFirst.hotspot1: According to the FAO protecting forests is essential to slow down climate change as they contain just over half of the carbon residing in terrestrial vegetation and soil, amounting to 1200 Gt of carbon.
preservationFirst.hotspot2: One Acre of Amazon rainforest can store approximately 49 tonnes of CO2

preservationSecond.hotspot1: You are now protecting a bigger forest and biodiversity has increased
preservationSecond.hotspot2: According to the FAO protecting forests is essential to slow down climate change as they contain just over half of the carbon residing in terrestrial vegetation and soil, amounting to 1200 Gt of carbon.
preservationSecond.hotspot3: One Acre of Amazon rainforest can store approximately 49 tonnes of CO2

projectDetails.yourImpactShare: Here’s something you should share with the world!
projectDetails.inviteAFriendPlant: Share your code to plant 10 trees each!
projectDetails.inviteAFriendCopy:
Want to plant 10 trees for free?
Use code {{value}} to join Green Future Project!
Start your climate journey at https://cutt.ly/wK9mydK
projectDetails.popUpCO2:
Flight: A passenger flying one-way Economy from Rome to NYC will emit 1,027kg of CO2. This means that for every km flown we emit 0,15119kg CO2.

Next flight: We have included the percentage of your next ‘Rome-NYC’ flight that is being offset.
projectDetails.popUpTrees:
Tennis court: The size of a tennis court is 264m2. Trees are planted 1,5 meters apart. This means that it takes 173 trees to fill up 1 tennis court. The size of an acre is 4,046m2. This means that it takes 16 tennis courts to fill 1 acre. 

Next Court: We have included the percentage of your next tennis court that is being filled.
projectDetails.popUpTreesH:
Tennis court: The size of a tennis court is 264m2. Trees are planted 1,5 meters apart. This means that it takes 173 trees to fill up 1 tennis court. The size of an hectare is 10,000m2. This means that it takes 40 tennis courts to fill 1 hectare. 

Next Court: We have included the percentage of your next tennis court that is being filled.
projectDetails.popUpAcres:
The size of an acre is 4,046m2. This means that it takes 16 tennis courts to fill 1 acre.

Next Court: We have included the percentage of your next tennis court that is being filled.
projectDetails.popUpHectares:
The size of an hectare is 10,000m2. This means that it takes 40 tennis courts to fill 1 hectare.

Next Court: We have included the percentage of your next tennis court that is being filled.

renewableFirst.hotspot1: Keep up the good work! You've already powered 1 house for 1 year! (3.7 MWH)

renewableSecond.hotspot1: Clearing skies and a gentle breeze!🌤 You've powered at least 5 houses for 1 year, that's a mini neighbourhood! (7.4MWH)

restorationFirst.hotspot1: Your young trees are growing, slowly but surely. 🌱
restorationFirst.hotspot2: Your newly planted forest is populated by pollinators such as butterflies, bats, bees and moths.
restorationFirst.hotspot3: Your newly planted forest is populated by small animals like mudflat filter crab (Uca rapax) and rainbow parrotfish larvae (Scarus guamacaia)
restorationFirst.hotspot4: Mangroves are a key part of coastal ecosystems, renowned for supporting fisheries, sediment regulation, and even helping to protect against storms and tsunamis.

restorationFourth.hotspot1: Wow! A mature forest with a high level of biodiversity - watch out you've also attracted alpha predators!🦁
restorationFourth.hotspot2: You mangrove forest is now strong and healthy. It is home to an immense diversity of flora and fauna. The restoration of this coastal land will protect local communities against storms and tsunamis for generations to come.
restorationFourth.hotspot3: Your mangrove forest is now abundant in giant barracuda, mangrove snapper, jacks, trevally, grouper, stingrays, and various other fish
restorationFourth.hotspot4: Your mangrove is now populated by numerous alpha predators such as young lemon sharks (Negaprion brevirostris), striated heron (Butorides striata) manatees and dugongs ; alligators and crocodiles.

restorationSecond.hotspot1: Your mangrove forest is now rich in shrimp, crab, and shellfish and provides habitat to a variety of birdlife.
restorationSecond.hotspot2: Your mangrove trees have elongated stems, deeper roots and a greater number of leaves
restorationSecond.hotspot3: Mangroves are one of the most effective tools for offsetting carbon emissions. For each mangrove tree that is planted  over 308kg of CO2 are removed from the atmosphere during its lifetime – an average of 12.3kg per year.
restorationSecond.hotspot4: Mangroves are a key part of coastal ecosystems, renowned for supporting fisheries, sediment regulation, and even helping to protect against storms and tsunamis.
restorationSecond.hotspot5: Your forest is populated by a greater variety of animal such as rainbow parrotfish juvenile (Scarus guamacaia) and goliath grouper juvenile (Epinephelus itajara);  juvenile mangrove snapper (Lutjanus griseus); brown pelican (Pelecanus occidentalis); white ibis (Eudocimus albus).
restorationSecond.hotspot6: Your ecosystem is attracting flora and fauna, take a look at it.

restorationThird.hotspot1: Your Mangroves trees are now growing into a healthy forest that will better protect local communities against storms and tsunamis.
restorationThird.hotspot2: Your mangrove trees have branches, much deeper roots and a copious number of leaves.
restorationThird.hotspot3: Mangroves are one of the most effective tools for offsetting carbon emissions. For each mangrove tree that is planted over 308kg of CO2 are removed from the atmosphere during its lifetime – an average of 12.3kg per year.
restorationThird.hotspot4: Mangroves are a key part of coastal ecosystems, renowned for supporting fisheries, sediment regulation, and even helping to protect against storms and tsunamis.
restorationThird.hotspot5: Your forest is populated by a greater variety of animal such as rainbow parrotfish juvenile (Scarus guamacaia) and goliath grouper juvenile (Epinephelus itajara); juvenile mangrove snapper (Lutjanus griseus); brown pelican (Pelecanus occidentalis); white ibis (Eudocimus albus).
restorationThird.hotspot6: Your forest has more trees and biodiversity is increased! 🌳

stages.renewable_energy1: Keep up the good work; you've already powered at least 1 house! (7.4 MWH) 🏠
stages.renewable_energy2: Clearing skies and a gentle breeze!🌤 You've powered 5 houses, that's a mini neighbourhood! (18.5 MWH)
stages.renewable_energy3: You've got the power!🔌 20 houses and counting. Keep that energy going. (3 windmills / 74 MWH)
stages.renewable_energy4: It takes YOU to power a village, that's 50 homes! Nothing can stop you now. (4 windmills / 85 MWH) 🏘
stages.marine_restoration0: Plant some corals to start preserving our marine environments!
stages.marine_restoration1: Stop worrying. Don't give up! 🤗 You have mostly sand right now, with a few bleached coral patches and a few healthy corals rehomed on-site.
stages.marine_restoration2: You have an appointment with your reef! 🌅 The sand seafloor has evolved since the first stage, with fewer bleached coral patches and more healthy corals.
stages.marine_restoration3: That is incredible!💥 The visibility of the seabed deteriorates. It's growing in size. The polyps are especially noticeable🐙. Smaller schools of fish are forming around the corals. You have turtles! 🐢
stages.marine_restoration4: WHAT👏A👏GREAT👏GAME! The seabed is only made of sand ⛱. The reef has been completely rebuilt and is now rising. Increase of colourful fish swimming close to the corals🐠. Sharks have joined the mix!🦈

tools.description1: Besides financing all certified projects in 1 click, you can track your previous climate action and share analytics, visuals & full reports with your stakeholders.

welcomeOnBoard.title: Welcome onboard GFP!
welcomeOnBoard.partOfGFP:
Company name is now part of the 
Green Future Project
welcomeOnBoard.allowYourFriends: Allow your friends to join you on your environmental journey.
welcomeOnBoard.shareYourGFP: Share your GFP subscription and related climate projects.
welcomeOnBoard.shareWithEmployees: Share the impact of your subscription with the employees you’ve chosen. Show them your GFP dashboard and the specifics of your project.
welcomeOnBoard.description: Thank you for being awesome and helping save the planet!
welcomeOnBoard.sentEmail: We sent you an e-mail with all the information regarding your investment!
welcomeOnBoard.checkoutSummary: Check out your impact and purchase summary:

yourImpact.byProducing: By producing {{value}} Kw/h of clean energy
yourImpact.infoBody:
GFP lets you offset your carbon footprint by funding projects that remove or prevent CO2 emissions elsewhere. 

 The project's CO2 offset is either certified by third parties (Gold Standard, Carbon Verra or Invest Conservation) or backed by scientific research
yourImpact.certifiedBody: Every tonne of CO2 offset in this section is certified by either of Gold Standard, Carbon Verra, or Invest Conservation.
yourImpact.scienceBody:
We decided to go beyond the carbon credit scheme and show you the CO2 offset generated by our science-backed solutions (e.g. tree planting and preservation initiatives). 
In other words, your monthly subscription will be worth more CO2 offsets than what you are paying for. It is our way of saying thank you!
yourImpact.flightsBody:
You contribute 1,027kg of CO2 when flying economy from Rome to NY? 
Embark on our zero-carbon journey to make your impact fly high!
yourImpact.tennisTitle: Did you know a tennis court is 264m2 large?
yourImpact.tennisBody:
The ball's in your court. 
Are you ready to reforest lots of tennis courts worth of land with us?
yourImpact.householdsTitle: Did you know an average European house consumes 3.7MWh of energy per year?
yourImpact.householdsBody: Supercharge your clean power production to make more homes zero-carbon!

whyJoin.title: Enable your company to create impact at scale
whyJoin.description: Become a part of a powerful business Community
whyJoin.link: Book a call with our team
whyJoin.cardDescription1: Compensate your company’s emissions and employees' footprint
whyJoin.cardDescription2: Track and share the impact you are making by downloading our comprehensive reports
whyJoin.cardDescription3: Share your project assets and positive impact with stakeholders - our Integration Tool connects directly to your website
whyJoin.cardDescription4: Educate, and cultivate a sustainability culture throughout your company
whyJoin.whyShouldBusiness: Why should your business join GFP?
whyJoin.progress1: Choose the subscription that best suits your business needs
whyJoin.progress2: Get access to our database of scientific and certified climate projects
whyJoin.progress3: Streamline your impact and gather all your data in one place
whyJoin.progress4: Use GFP’s Data Integration Tool to view and share your impact
whyJoin.getDescription1: Access to a personalized dashboard where you can track the impact you are making  and learn about the projects you are supporting.
whyJoin.getDescription2: A widget for you to integrate the counters of the real time impact you are making on your own website.
whyJoin.getDescription3: Get updates and access to photos and videos of the projects to share with your clients and stakeholders.
whyJoin.getDescription4: Receive personalised reports of your monthly impact sent directly to your inbox. You can download them through your dashboard.
whyJoin.apiDescription:
Through our API technology, GFP seamlessly integrates your positive impact into your products and services. 
Check out our Data Integration options and tools.
whyJoin.join: Are you ready to join GFP?
whyJoin.joinDescription: Set the new standards and be a leader in your industry!
whyJoin.serviceDescription1: Our marketing team provides bespoke marketing strategies by curating the campaigns your company’s needs to: raise environmental consciousness, boost brand value, and increase consumer loyalty and engagement.
whyJoin.serviceDescription2: With our partners Pilio Group, University of Oxford Environmental Change Institute, we provide you with 360 insight on your footprint and help you commit to a more sustainable governance strategy.

apiIntegration.title: API: One technology to connect them all
apiIntegration.description: Show the world the impact you are making by integrating your climate counters on your website.
apiIntegration.progressDataTitle: How to activate Data integration Tool
apiIntegration.progressData2: Log on to you Personalized Dashboard
apiIntegration.progressData3: Go to your notification board and follow the steps
apiIntegration.progressData4: Integrate your impact data on your website!
apiIntegration.progressClimateTitle: How to activate Climate Pioneer Integration
apiIntegration.progressClimate1: Select the climate pioneer subscription plan
apiIntegration.progressClimate2: Choose Revenue % Model or Tree per Item Model
apiIntegration.progressClimate4: Select your CMS and authenticate the integration
apiIntegration.stepDescription1:
Our GFP plugin seamlessly integrates your real-time impact data on your company’s website.
You will be able to show the world the total number of trees planted, acres protected, CO2 removed and renewable energy generated, all in one GFP branded widget.
apiIntegration.stepDescription2:
For our Climate Pioneers only - automatically plant trees for every item sold or choose to allocate a % of your revenue.
 
Our GFP integration is a simple and easy-to-use way for you to automate the purchase of trees directly from your e-commerce or application.
 
We have plugins for Shopify, Woo-Commerce, Magento and WordPress, allowing you to fund reforestation projects automatically for every sale you make.
apiIntegration.joinDescription: Set the new standards and be a leader in your industry!
apiIntegration.shape: Are you ready to shape the future?

certified.explanation: Certified tonnes are CO2 tonnes linked to carbon credits which certify an exact amount that can be offset.

faq.formDescription: Drop us an email and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!
faq.mockDescription: To achieve the highest standard of sustainability and optimize the efficiency of donations, 60% of your contributions are dedicated to reforestation, ecosystems preservation and marine protection, whilst an estimated 20% are used to support clean and renewable energy projects. The remaining 20% is used to cover operating costs and spreading the word.

ecommAPI.title: E-commerce & APP API
ecommAPI.subtitle: Climate action per transaction
ecommAPI.forWhomContent: Whether you run a retail shop, a Shopify store, or sell your products & services through your website or app, you can generate impact via either our manual set up our automatic API.
ecommAPI.whatWeDoContent: By intergrating our API with your e-commerce or app, you generate positive climate impact for every sale or transaction
ecommAPI.whyWeDoContent: We help you integrate climate action into your business model to boost your ESG perfomance and help you reach your net-zero targets
ecommAPI.decarbonCardHeaderText: How would you like to contribute
ecommAPI.decarbonCardBodyText: The GFP eCommerce API helps to compensate your business' residual CO2 footpring by investing either:
ecommAPI.integrationCardHeaderText: What kind of integration do you need?
ecommAPI.integrationCardBodyText: You can select the integration modality that best fits your business needs:
ecommAPI.percentageBody: A percentage of your monthly revenue
ecommAPI.setAmountBody: A set amount for every product or service you sell
ecommAPI.automaticIntegrationDesc: Connect your ecommerce or app to GPF's portal, so your impact will be updated in real-time according to your transactions!
ecommAPI.manualIntegrationDesc: Manually update your data by adding your impact via our dashboard every first of the month
ecommAPI.automaticIntegrationAlternativesDesc: Check out the integration providers you can use to get the most out of our API solution!
ecommAPI.gfpDesc: Once you’ve activated your E-commerce & APP API, you’ll have a custom GFP code snippet. By inserting it into your online checkout flow, you’ll start making positive impact every time one of your customers buys something.
ecommAPI.shopifyDesc: Install our dedicated app in your Shopify store to seamlessly offset your carbon emissions with every online transaction
ecommAPI.zapierDesc: Share your GFP data with a wide range of CRM and CMS using our dedicated Zapier integrations
ecommAPI.positiveImpactDesc: The E-commerce & App API includes access to our personalised dashboard where you can:
ecommAPI.manageImpactDesc: Besides financing all certified projects in 1 click, you can track your previous climate action and share analytics, visuals & full reports with your stakeholders.
ecommAPI.showImpactHeading: Show your Impact Counter in real-time
ecommAPI.showImpactDesc: Display your climate action in real-time through your customizable Impact Counter and give full access to your GFP Portal to customers and investors!
ecommAPI.liveExpDesc: Teleport yourself in the middle of the ecosystem you’re supporting. Enjoy the sound of the Amazon forest or the Atlantic Ocean. Look at the land and marine biodiversity you’re preserving.
ecommAPI.engageEmpDesc: Your climate positive transactions will let you build 3D ecosystems level by level. Thanks to this gamified experience, your staff will be more motivated and climate-conscious.
ecommAPI.showPositiveImpactHeading: Show your positive impact in real time!
ecommAPI.showPositiveImpactDesc:
Displaying our Impact Counter on your website, app or other location, your stakeholders will see your climate action in real-time.
 By clicking the "discover" button, they will freely access a read-only version of your dashboard where they can check full details of your positive impact.
ecommAPI.readyToMakeImpactDesc: Start your journey with our eCommerce & App API today.

climatePositiveSubscription.title: Climate Positive Subscription
climatePositiveSubscription.subtitle: Designed for businesses aspiring to improve their sustainabilty actions / strategy
climatePositiveSubscription.createSubscription: Create your subscription plan taking into account your company’s number of employees and their lifestyles. Each employee has a different impact according to their job, tasks, consumption, and workstyle.
climatePositiveSubscription.select: Select the number of employees in each category:
climatePositiveSubscription.how: How many of your employees could be considered
climatePositiveSubscription.forWhomContent: Businesses of any size that want to improve and strenghten their journey towards net-zero.
climatePositiveSubscription.whatWeDoContent: We offer you solutions that can compensate a part of employees’ professional and private lifestyle carbon footprint.
climatePositiveSubscription.whyWeDoContent: Climate mitigation should be a priority for businesses and our platfrom simplifies achieving net-zero targets.
climatePositiveSubscription.decarboniseDesc:
We've identified three employee categories based on business travel and commute habits, 
 which are the major sources of carbon emissions for business workforce.
climatePositiveSubscription.decarboniseHighlight: *Regardless of the type of employee you choose, our subscriptions offset their average carbon footprint in your region (e.g., Europe).
climatePositiveSubscription.notSure: Not sure of the environmental impact of your employees? just use our
climatePositiveSubscription.supportedProjectsDesc: Check out the projects that you will support with your Climate Positive Subscription!
climatePositiveSubscription.positiveImpactDesc: The Climate Positive Subscription includes access to our personalised dashboard where you can:
climatePositiveSubscription.impactCounterHeader: Show your Impact Counter in real time!
climatePositiveSubscription.impactCounterDesc: Displaying our Impact Counter on your website, app or other location, your stakeholders will see your climate action in real-time.
climatePositiveSubscription.impactCounterDesc2: By clicking the "discover" button, they will freely access a read-only version of your dashboard where they can check full details of your positive impact.
climatePositiveSubscription.bigCompany: Do you have a big company?
climatePositiveSubscription.contactUsDesc: Contact us if you are interested in reducing the impact of more than 200 employees!
climatePositiveSubscription.globeTrottersDesc: This covers an annual travelling of either 4 long-haul (<9h) return flights or 10 short-haul (<3h) return flights or 40,000 km driven by car.
climatePositiveSubscription.frequentFlyersDesc: This covers an annual travelling of either 2 long-haul (<9h) return flights or 5 short-haul (<3h) return flights or 20,000 km driven by car.
climatePositiveSubscription.ecoFriendlyDesc: Eco-friendly employees are those who barely do any business travel and commute by public transport, bike or car sharing.

greenNFT.we: We're unlocking the power of NFTs by letting their creators use a % of their royalties to finance climate positive projects.
greenNFT.are: Are you an non-fungible token (NFT) creator?
greenNFT.creators: Creators, artists, fashion designers and brands who want to create a positive climate impact through the sales of their digital tokens and collectibles can benefit from our Green NFT Plug-in!
greenNFT.our: Our plug-in lets NFTs creators invest a % of their royalties in climate projects. Creators and their communities can access GFP’s dashboard to:
greenNFT.track: Track, visualise and share NFTs trade positive impact.
greenNFT.nft: NFT creation relies on blockchain. We help you to reduce NFTs’ environmental impact. A single NFT transaction on the Etherium Network emits 97.5 kg of CO2:
greenNFT.the: The same carbon footprint of driving an average car for nearly 250 km.
greenNFT.enabled: Enabled by blockchain, the NFT trade could supercharge the power of collective action in scaling up climate solutions.
greenNFT.NFTs: NFTs minting and trading is carbon-intensive. As a result, eco-conscious creators are reluctant to use them, thus giving up on invaluable opportunities.
greenNFT.designed: Designed for the Ethereum blockchain, our plug-in lets creators and their supporters fund climate positive projects throug NFTs trade.
greenNFT.want: Want to make your NFTs climate-friendly?
greenNFT.contactUs: Contact us to activate our plug-in!

monthlyClimateSubscription.title: Monthly Climate Subscription
monthlyClimateSubscription.subtitle: Offset your own and your family's CO2 footprint.
monthlyClimateSubscription.forWhomDesc: People who want to green their lifestyle and help their family members do the same.
monthlyClimateSubscription.whatWeDoDesc: You can customise your carbon reduction plan based on your footprint and family members.
monthlyClimateSubscription.whyWeDoItDesc: Harnessing the power of collective action is the only way to reverse climate change.
monthlyClimateSubscription.decarboniseHeading: Decarbonise your carbon footprint as individual or as a family!
monthlyClimateSubscription.positiveImpactDesc: Your Monthly Climate Subscription includes access to your personalised dashboard where you can:
monthlyClimateSubscription.socialShareHeading: Share your climate action on socials
monthlyClimateSubscription.socialShareDesc: Want to shout about your positive impact on the climate and engage other people? Just share GFP’s Impact Card on social media. It’s one of your Monthly Climate Subscription perks!
monthlyClimateSubscription.readyToMakeImpactDesc: Start your journey with our Monthly Climate Subscription plans today.
monthlyClimateSubscription.climateHeroDesc: For globetrotters and those who want to offset more than their lifestyle.
monthlyClimateSubscription.climateRangerDesc: For frequent flyers and those who want to become climate positive.
monthlyClimateSubscription.climateTrooperDesc: For citizens who want to take their first steps along the zero-carbon path
monthlyClimateSubscription.familyPlanDesc: You can make impact by creating a tailored plan taking into account the number of family members present in your family for each category:
monthlyClimateSubscription.planImpact: *Your monthly impact and cost are to be estimated once you select the number of family members for each category
monthlyClimateSubscription.trackAndShareDesc: Besides buying certified carbon offsets in 1 click, you can track your previous climate action and share it with your family & friends.
monthlyClimateSubscription.collectHeadingDesc: As you fund more climate positive projects, you’ll build 3D ecosystems to visualise your impact growth. Immersing yourself in a gamified experience, you’ll unlock new insights about your climate action as you level up.
monthlyClimateSubscription.enjoyLiveExperienceDesc: Teleport yourself in the middle of the ecosystem you’re supporting. Enjoy the sound of the Amazon forest or the Atlantic Ocean. Look at the land and marine biodiversity you’re preserving.

donationContactUs.donateMore: if you are interested in offsetting more than 250 tonnes!

nativa.heading: EMISSIONS OFFSET
nativa.subheading: Thanks to GFP, you can finance the best projects with certified carbon credits
nativa.introduction: Thanks to the collaboration of Chiesi, CEF and Nativa with Green Future Project, your pharmacy has access to certified credits from the Rimba Raya reserve in Indonesia. This investment will allow you to access a dedicated dashboard updated in real time, giving you full visibility on the positive impact generated by your pharmacy.
nativa.projectScope: Located near Tanjung Puting National Park, the Rimba Raya reserve serves as a buffer zone between protected areas, tropical forest and the palm oil industry. The credits in this reserve are Verra certified and selected by the Green Future Project scientific team following 3 essential indicators: biodiversity, the project's CO2 absorption capacity and the direct involvement of local communities.
nativa.privacyConsent: By checking this box you agree that your personal data will be used to process your order, support your experience on this website, and for other purposes described in our
nativa.marketingConsent: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates on GFP solutions and projects.

stepOne.instruction: Enter the exact amount of carbon credits to view your investment
stepOne.freeCreditInformation: In addition to the 3 tons of certified compensation already included in the CEF platform, you can purchase further certified carbon credits and thus achieve the carbon neutrality goal.

stepTwo.name: Name
stepTwo.addressInstructions: Fill in the missing information to complete the purchase. You will receive the invoice by email.
stepTwo.passwordInstructions: Use 8 or more characters, both letters and numbers and symbols
stepTwo.dontHaveAccount: Do you already have an account?

stepThree.instruction: Fill in the missing information to complete the purchase. You will receive the invoice by email.
stepThree.cvvHint: Enter the 3 digits found on the back of your card

welcomePage.titleTwo: We have sent you all the details of your investment by email
welcomePage.button: Go to the GFP home page

pilioPage.measureYourScope: Measure your Scope 1, 2 and 3 carbon emissions as well as real-time energy consumption to initiate targeted actions aimed at reaching energy efficiency and achieving your decarbonisation targets.
pilioPage.understanding: Understanding how Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions contribute to your footprint is the first step to an effective ESG journey.
pilioPage.theseAreDefined: These are defined as GHG emissions generated onsite from the activities an organisation owns or controls. (e.g. natural gas)
pilioPage.thisCategory: This category of GHG emissions includes indirect emissions generated from purchased energy. They are a result of a company’s energy consumption even though they physically occur at the facility that generated them. (e.g. electricity)
pilioPage.allEmissions: These are all those emissions a firm is responsible for but which happen outside of its walls and are controlled by other parties up and down the value chain (e.g., business travel, procurement, waste). As part of this scope you should also be able to monitor the consumption related to water.
pilioPage.whatCanYou:
What can you achieve with our
Energy Management & Carbon Footprint software?
pilioPage.startingPoint: The starting point of your reduction journey: a complimentary assessment that provides recommendations on key focus areas for the improvement of your energy efficiency.
pilioPage.monitorAndManage: Monitor and manage your energy consumption to save money, reduce your environmental impact, and report achievements.
pilioPage.calculateYourCompany: Calculate your company's carbon footprint and demonstrate accountability by setting targets and working towards your net zero goals.
pilioPage.whyIsIt: Why is it crucial for companies to measure their carbon footprint?
pilioPage.ifYouCant: If you can't measure, you can't improve
pilioPage.ifYouDont: If you do not measure your carbon emissions appropriately, your ESG strategies may require a great effort and prove ineffective in terms of real impact. Measuring and monitoring one's own emissions is the fundamental basis for developing effective and transparent net zero targets with their relative action plans.
pilioPage.attentionTo: Attention to sustainability not only concerns ethical and moral issues, but also has an impact on the company's reputation. More and more people are choosing to buy sustainably. By knowing that their purchase’s impact is accounted for in a company’s wider ESG strategy will contribute in increasing the brand equity and ultimately influence consumers decisions.
pilioPage.complyWith: Comply with the regulations and avoid surprises
pilioPage.Measuring: Measuring carbon emissions, in all relevant areas, is essential for companies that want to keep in line with future environmental regulations.
pilioPage.lessCosts: Less costs for the environment and for  companies
pilioPage.byQuantifying: By quantifying and monitoring energy consumption and related CO2 emissions, it is possible to identify any inefficiencies in business processes as well as highlight the results of an effective ESG strategy.
pilioPage.integrating: Integrating sustainability into the company also brings economic  benefits
pilioPage.companies:
Companies that integrate sustainability into their business model are able to achieve a 18% higher ROI*. Furthermore, sustainable products grow on average, in terms of sales, 5.6 times faster than non-sustainable products**.

*Source: Carbon Disclosure Project Worldwide (CDP)
**Source: NYU Stern’s Center for Sustainable Business
pilioPage.lookingDedicated: Looking for a dedicated support on your ESG Journey?
pilioPage.ourCarbonAccounting: Our Carbon Accounting & ESG Experts provide advisory services that span from corporate, product or event carbon footprint reporting to the definition of a decarbonisation strategy, including recommended actions, science-based targets and roadmap.
pilioPage.discover: Discover how companies partner with GFP on measuring and improving their Energy Efficiency and Carbon Footprint
pilioPage.theWbsc: The WBSC has committed to environmental sustainability, including global well-being and sustainable development as key pillars of their global baseball/softball community. As part of this commitment, the WBSC has commissioned GFP and Pilio to calculate their 2022 carbon footprint, to be seen as a baseline for its reduction strategy.
pilioPage.the2022: The 2022 Carbon Footprint Report is the result of this assessment and it takes guidance from the GHG Reporting Protocol, the UK Government Environmental Reporting Guidelines (March 2019), and from the UK Government GHG Conversion Factors for Company Reporting for calculating carbon emissions. It includes recommendations on how to reduce both direct as well as indirect emissions.
pilioPage.createdThrough: Created through collaboration with Enel X Way, E-GAP is Italy's first urban, mobile, and on-demand fast charging service. E-GAP chose GFP and Pilio to analyze its carbon footprint, with a full Carbon Audit and Product Impact Report, from battery production to back-office energy use.
pilioPage.through: Through GFP, E-gap carried out a comparative study in terms of CO2 emissions which shows that the emissions per km of E-GAP recharges are lower than the emissions of fixed charging points. Additionally E-GAP offsets all of its workforce emissions with GFP Climate Positive Subscription and for every recharge made by an E-GAP user, 1 mangrove tree is planted in Madagascar together with the protection of 1 square meter of rainforest in Ecuador.
pilioPage.ldp: LDP understands the importance of acting on climate change in compliance with the Paris Climate Agreement. For this reason LDP has chosen GFP to carry out its first complete Energy and Carbon Footprint assessment, in accordance with the international carbon accounting standard of the GHG Reporting Protocol.
pilioPage.ldpCarbon:
LDP carbon impacts have been measured in relation to:
- Scope 1: direct emissions (e.g. natural gas)
- Scope 2: indirect energy-related emissions (e.g. electricity)

Through this report covering 2021-2023, LDP is now able to understand and quantify its carbon footprint and to reduce its impact on the environment by optimising its energy consumption.
pilioPage.checkOut:
Check out our latest news on businesses
Carbon Footprint and Energy Efficiency

solutions.the360: The 360° ESG Solution for your Net Zero Journey
solutions.gfp: Green Future Project offers you an end-to-end solution that allows you to satisfy all your environmental needs in one go. Discover all you can measure, monitor and visualize through our turn-key SaaS platform as well as all the effective and integrated tools at your disposal to engage your community on your journey to become a carbon neutral company.

measure.leverage: Leverage on our Energy Management & Carbon Footprint software to measure your Scope 1, 2 and 3 carbon emissions and initiate targeted actions aimed at saving energy and reducing your company’s footprint.
measure.atGFP: At GFP we recommend starting your net zero journey with a complimentary assessment that provides recommendations on key areas to focus on to become a sustainable business.
measure.connectYourEneregy: Connect your energy consumption data to monitor it at a glance and in real-time so you can continuously reduce your environmental impact across your company’s buildings portfolio.
measure.ourSolution: Our solution will allow you to gain full visibility of your company's carbon footprint further supporting your CO2 emission reduction roadmap.

offset.aRange: A range of high-quality solutions to compensate your carbon emissions.
offset.measure: Measure and reduce are the first fundamental steps of a net zero journey. Next comes offsetting though verified and top-in-class carbon credits or biodiversity tokens. Simply insert the emissions you’d like to compensate for and select the solution that suits you best.
offset.asCarbon: As a carbon neutral company you can be a catalyst of change. Invest in offsetting the professional and personal carbon footprint of your employees. Such commitment will generate a full engagement in your company’s ESG strategy.
offset.scaleUp: Scale up your impact and decarbonise as you sell by giving your customers the opportunity to support trusted environmental projects with every transaction or product they buy.
offset.weAdopt: We adopt 3 indicators to select our projects: biodiversity, CO2 absorption capacity and ability to support local communities. Plus, we have a very close relationship with the NGOs we work with, which allows us to minimize intermediaries and have a greater impact per euro spent.
offset.ifYouAre: If you are a creator and want to generate a positive climate impact through the sales of your digital tokens and collectibles, our Green NFT Plug-in is the right solution for you. Use a % of your royalties to finance climate positive projects.
offset.leadTheWay: Lead the way within your community and gift either a subscription or a positive impact through our restoration or preservation projects. From planting a tree to regenerating ocean’s ecosystems, you can tailor your thoughtful gift to your values.

track.track: Track, report and visualize real-time your company’s climate impact.
track.fullTransparency:
Full transparency on your
climate investments
track.ourPlatform: Our platform simplifies the process of collecting all the information needed in one place: you can monitor your impact, download reports and share them confidently with clients and stakeholders. Plus, the GFP dashboard leverages on an innovative satellite technology to give you full visibility on projects’ progress.

communicate.showcase: Showcase and share all aspects of your climate action.
communicate.ourWidget: Our widget showcases all key metrics related to your climate positive impact in real-time. Add it to any digital platform you own to engage your community and bring it closer to the projects you support.
communicate.fromCarbon: From carbon offset or biodiversity tokens to tree planting, make your ESG strategy and milestones visible through our sharable impact cards and quarterly impact reports.
communicate.integrate: Integrate your climate positive investments into your brand’s storytelling. Our Media Kit provides you with the tools to effectively communicate our partnership, including social media templates, project photos and much more.

esg.ourTeam: Our team of experts is here to support your carbon accounting & reporting needs.
esg.weCarry: We carry out the LCA based on ISO 14067. This allows companies to take action by calculating their impact along the value chain or offsetting emissions.
esg.weProvide: We provide a full carbon audit across all areas of impact which increases companies’ visibility and understanding while representing a starting point to achieve an event’s carbon neutrality.
esg.weSupport: We support organizations in setting GHG emissions boundaries for Scope 1, 2 & 3 using the GHG Protocol, hereby delivering a full Carbon Audit Analysis. Our assessments include recommendations for reduction of impact across all areas.
esg.weOffer: We offer technical and operational support in setting up, managing data and drafting Sustainability Reports, in compliance with the main international reporting standards.
